question: Veteran sportsperson of India Hamza Koya, who recently passed away due to Covid-19, was associated with which sports?
explanation:
Former Indian footballer from the state of Kerala, Hamza Koya recently passed away after contracting Covid-19. 
The veteran sportsperson had represented Maharashtra at the Santhosh Trophy. He was also a member of the national team in Nehru trophy. Though he was given plasma therapy treatment, he passed away at the age of 61.
